title: NOW Solutions Castor Oil, 100 % Pure, 16 ounce
description: Condition:  In need of an all-natural emollient.  Solution:  100% Pure Castor Oil is expeller-pressed from the seed of Ricinus communisand is virtually odorless and tasteless.  While it's applicable in many other areas of wellness, Castor Oil is considered by many to be one of the finest natural skin emollients available today.  Also known as Palma Christi (the "Palm of Christ"), castor oil celebrates a history of use that dates back to biblical times.  Since then, it has been used therapeutically to help support and soften healthy skin and hair, and is commonly used in some of today's most popular cosmetic and beauty formulas.  NOW® Solutions is the next step in the evolution of personal care products.  This comprehensive natural line encompasses anti-aging moisturizers and serums, bath and body gels, shampoos and conditioners, oral care, skin care, and essential oils. all of which are formulated with the finest functional ingredients from around the world.  NOW® Solutions products avoid harsh chemicals and synthetic ingredients in all of our formulations, to provide a more natural product line.

title: Clear Face Turmeric Cream
description:
This 100% natural cream should be stored below 80 degrees.  If the cream should become thinner during shipping,  it does not affect the quality or effectiveness of the cream.  However, if you would like it thicker, it is optional to store in refrigerator.  Please feel free to email us with any questions.Clear Face Turmeric Lotion: 
This lightweight organic lotion blends certified organic turmeric extract. 
Turmeric has anti-inflammatory, anti-bacterial properties that fight blemishes for clear skin, naturally. This turmeric cream contains soothing certified organic aloe vera, rooibos tea, coconut oil and lavender. It is enhanced with jojoba oil, olive oil, Vitamin E and neem oil making this a powerful face and body lotion for all skin types. 


Promotes clear skin - Lightweight - Moisturizing.
Ideal for sensitive skin!
Anti-oxident, anti-inflammatory, anti bacterial properties.
Preservative free base.
Made with certified organic ingredients around 90%, highest in industry standards.

At Passport to Organics we find beauty secret ingredients from around the world, passed down from one generation to the next.

We search for tried and true natural organic solutions, since we believe natural is better. 

These worldly botanicals, essential oils, herbs, and minerals are formulated to develop the most powerful and effective skin and body care products which are 100% natural.


We Just Say No to: 
No petrochemicals -
No parabens -
No GMOs -
No synthetic or harmful ingredients -
No animal testing.


We just say YES to:

100% natural products -
Eco-friendly -
Organic solutions -
Naturally effective.Reviews:This cream has been a miracle for me!  - Waynesville, NCI just recieved your product but already, I love it. Keep up the good work - Betty from The Villages, Florida
